meanings.definition: Shown or demonstrated to be true or valid.

meanings.sent2: Her skills were proven when she successfully completed the challenging task.
meanings.sent3: It was proven that eating vegetables is good for your health.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work has proven him to be a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The witness's testimony proven crucial in solving the case.
